verses.name: Habakkuk 2:9
verses.text: Woe to him that coveteth an evil covetousness to his house, that he may set his nest on high, that he may be delivered from the power of evil!

verses.name: Habakkuk 2:10
verses.text: Thou hast consulted shame to thy house by cutting off many people, and hast sinned against thy soul.

verses.name: Habakkuk 2:11
verses.text: For the stone shall cry out of the wall, and the beam out of the timber shall answer it.

verses.name: Habakkuk 2:12
verses.text: Woe to him that buildeth a town with blood, and stablisheth a city by iniquity!
